title: Yaazhini En Yaazhini Lyrics From Titanic Tamil Movie
stanzas:
Here Yaazhini En Yaazhini Lyrics From Titanic Tamil Movie directed by M Janakiraman. Yaazhini Song is composed by Nivas K Prasanna and sung by Vijay Prakash.Yazhini Song lyrics in written by Madhan Karky.
Yazhini Song Lyrics in Thanglish  Mazhai mugile
en mel thavalugiraai.
thiranthidave
yeno thayangugiraai (2)

mudhal thuli enge vilundhidumo
adhil en nenjam nanainthidumo

yaazhini en yaazhini
neethan endhan naal ini.
yaazhini en yaazhini
neeye vazhvini (2)
